topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: PHP Open Source SMTP

screenshots.caption: A small area of the code as highlighted by TextWrangler

short_description: POSS is a suite of multi-platform PHP scripts allowing users to implement features of the SMTP protocol on their PHP enabled web-server. POSS is currently comprised of email, a fully featured, functionally compatible mail() replacement.
